text: my job was to really reimagine how we
can help transform waffhead into a
digital First Bank and one of those is
improving customer experience with the
call center so when clients First Call
in we use Amazon transcribe which takes
what they're saying and translates it to
text once that speech has been
translated to text that gets sent to
Amazon Lex which is in determining what
intent is what they're called the person
is trying to accomplish once Amazon Lux
finds a response now it has to use
Amazon poly to then translate what the
text is back to speech which then is
what the customer ultimately hears so
then we use Amazon comprehend to take
all the dialogue that's being gathered
and then run sentiment analysis on it so
we can actually see and score how well
people are interacting with the Bots the
conversational AI actually sits below uh
sort of the the interaction Channel if
you can think about that because some
customers aren't coming in through
calling in and other customers are
coming in through the chat but both of
those channels come to the same
conversational AI bot and so what that
ultimately is doing is allowing
customers to reach us really in any
channel that they want having basically
an exact same experience no matter what
channel they come in and so it reduces
friction the other thing is by doing uh
voice Biometrics that's allowing the
customers to reduce fraud so you can
literally go how much is in my account
ending in 6615 and the bot will reply
250 dollars that same experience took
four and a half minutes in the old
system and now you can do it in about 25
seconds the bank has probably about a
half a million contacts a year and we
believe if we can get to a 30 or 40
percent uh of the contacts to be able to
be self-service by the bot that's a
direct impact on the amount of people
that will actually have to go to a call
center agent and so those are kind of
the big big goals that we have to um to
apply the technology to improve customer
service
